title: 整合包崩溃
txt_content:
crash-2015-11-20_20.20.21-client.txt
(8.33 KB, 下载次数: 1)



2015-11-20 20:30 上传
点击文件名下载附件
崩溃报告





我的整合崩溃报告，懂的人帮说一下怎么解决。
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I feel sad now :(

Time: 15-11-20 下午8:20
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: shaneMercer
replies.txt_content:
缺少依赖包
学院都市超能力mod的依赖包加了没？
PS：其实这种错可以自己搞定的，noClassDefException -> 未找到指定类(缺少jar包)
